event.title: Monthly Fellowship meeting in Berlin, Germany

body.p: This month again, the Berlin Fellowship meeting will be in the Newthinking Store, in the Tucholskystr. 48, 10117 Berlin. We'll be there from 19:30. The themes still have to be defined, we will eep you updated by then. As usual, this invitation is for everyone interested in the FSFE or Free Software. We're looking forward to seeing you there!
